channel.title: Getting error when starting virtualbox
channel.description:
I installed whonix to virtualbox, but when I start it, the window closes and gives me an error:
Failed to open a session for the virtual machine **Whonix-Gateway-XFCE**.
Not in a hypervisor partition (HVP=0) (VERR_NEM_NOT_AVAILABLE).
VT-x is disabled in the BIOS (VERR_VMX_MSR_VMX_DISABLED).
|Result Code:|E_FAIL (0x80004005)| | --- | --- | |Component:|ConsoleWrap| |Interface:|IConsole {872da645-4a9b-1727-bee2-5585105b9eed}|
I have enabled virtualisation and this error still persists. Can someone help me with this please?

item.title: Getting error when starting virtualbox
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Whonix – 26 Dec 20

Please use Search Engines and see Documentation First

Please do not ask very basic questions because it will not work that way.

Search term for search engines.

site:whonix.org VERR_NEM_NOT_AVAILABLE

duckduckgo requires site:whonix.org. Google has better search results. This suffices for Google:

whonix VERR_NEM_NOT_AVAILABLE

Mentioned at the top of that page:

Whonix – 24 Dec 20

Whonix ™ in VirtualBox - Troubleshooting - Whonix ™ does not Start?

VT-x is disabled in the BIOS. / VERR_VMX_MSR_VMXON_DISABLED / VERR_SSM_FIELD_NOT_CONSECUTIVE / supR3HardenedWinReSpawn / Enable VT-x in BIOS / Aborted Status / Guru Mediation

Read full topic

item.title: Getting error when starting virtualbox

item.description:
please read:

http://www.dds6qkxpwdeubwucdiaord2xgbbeyds25rbsgr73tbfpqpt4a6vjwsyd.onion/wiki/VirtualBox/Troubleshooting

and if it doesnt solves your issue, complain to virtualbox

item.title: Getting error when starting virtualbox
item.dc:creator: user9
item.description:
I installed whonix to virtualbox, but when I start it, the window closes and gives me an error:

Failed to open a session for the virtual machine Whonix-Gateway-XFCE.

Not in a hypervisor partition (HVP=0) (VERR_NEM_NOT_AVAILABLE).

VT-x is disabled in the BIOS (VERR_VMX_MSR_VMX_DISABLED).

Result Code: E_FAIL (0x80004005)
Component: ConsoleWrap
Interface: IConsole {872da645-4a9b-1727-bee2-5585105b9eed}

I have enabled virtualisation and this error still persists. Can someone help me with this please?

Read full topic
